title: David Szalay Wins Big Book Award
summary: David Szalay, an author from Britain and Hungary, has won the Booker Prize for his book called Flesh. The judges who picked the winner said it is a very special and extraordinary book. This prize is a big honor for writers, and it helps more people read and enjoy great stories. Winning can make an author famous and inspire others to write. The Booker Prize is given every year to the best novel written in English. This news tells us about the celebration of good books and the hard work of authors. It's exciting to see how stories can bring people together and win awards.
